name: Borobudur Temple lights Up
description:
Celebrating Vesak day at the biggest Buddhist Temple in the world is something that every Buddhist dreams of. Pilgrims from all around the world are commencing a series of rituals and ceremonies.

It is also a time for capturing the beautiful moment during the full moon, many people come and join the celebration during the day and night.

Very unfortunate that some unresponsible visitors are damaging the moment by disrespecting rules and culture. Let’s hope this will never happen again.

I create 72 editions because Borobudur Temple has 72 stupas around the site.
